methods.name: close
methods.description: Closes the JSON generator.

methods.name: getAsString
methods.description: Returns the generated JSON content.

methods.name: isClosed
methods.description: Returns true if the JSON generator is closed; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: writeBlob
methods.description: Writes the specified Blob value as a base64-encoded string.

methods.name: writeBlobField
methods.signature: public Void writeBlobField(String fieldName, Blob blobValue)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and BLOB value.

methods.name: writeBoolean
methods.description: Writes the specified Boolean value.

methods.name: writeBooleanField
methods.signature: public Void writeBooleanField(String fieldName, Boolean booleanValue)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and Boolean value.

methods.name: writeDate
methods.description: Writes the specified date value in the ISO-8601 format.

methods.name: writeDateField
methods.signature: public Void writeDateField(String fieldName, Date dateValue)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and date value. The date value is written in the ISO-8601 format.

methods.name: writeDateTime
methods.description: Writes the specified date and time value in the ISO-8601 format.

methods.name: writeDateTimeField
methods.signature: public Void writeDateTimeField(String fieldName, Datetime datetimeValue)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and date and time value. The date and time value is written in the ISO-8601 format.

methods.name: writeEndArray
methods.description: Writes the ending marker of a JSON array (']').

methods.name: writeEndObject
methods.description: Writes the ending marker of a JSON object ('}').

methods.name: writeFieldName
methods.description: Writes a field name.

methods.name: writeId
methods.description: Writes the specified ID value.

methods.name: writeIdField
methods.signature: public Void writeIdField(String fieldName, Id identifier)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and identifier value.

methods.name: writeNull
methods.description: Writes the JSON null literal value.

methods.name: writeNullField
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and the JSON null literal value.

methods.name: writeNumber
methods.description: Writes the specified decimal value.

methods.name: writeNumber
methods.description: Writes the specified double value.

methods.name: writeNumber
methods.description: Writes the specified integer value.

methods.name: writeNumber
methods.description: Writes the specified long value.

methods.name: writeNumberField
methods.signature: public Void writeNumberField(String fieldName, Decimal number)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and decimal value.

methods.name: writeNumberField
methods.signature: public Void writeNumberField(String fieldName, Double number)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and double value.

methods.name: writeNumberField
methods.signature: public Void writeNumberField(String fieldName, Integer number)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and integer value.

methods.name: writeNumberField
methods.signature: public Void writeNumberField(String fieldName, Long number)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and long value.

methods.name: writeObject
methods.description: Writes the specified Apex object in JSON format.

methods.name: writeObjectField
methods.signature: public Void writeObjectField(String fieldName, Object value)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and Apex object.

methods.name: writeStartArray
methods.description: Writes the starting marker of a JSON array ('[').

methods.name: writeStartObject
methods.description: Writes the starting marker of a JSON object ('{').

methods.name: writeString
methods.description: Writes the specified string value.

methods.name: writeStringField
methods.signature: public Void writeStringField(String fieldName, String stringValue)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and string value.

methods.name: writeTime
methods.description: Writes the specified time value in the ISO-8601 format.

methods.name: writeTimeField
methods.signature: public Void writeTimeField(String fieldName, Time timeValue)
methods.description: Writes a field name and value pair using the specified field name and time value in the ISO-8601 format.
